review: Nice sturdy binder. Not flimsy and holds up well. When full it doesn't bulge out messing with the spine of the binder. lightweight so when you add all the paper and folders you don't have the weight of a heavy binder to add weight. kids carry around a lot of books and binders these days anything that can help lighten that load is great in my book!
productTitle: Wilson Jones Heavy Duty Round Ring View Binder with Extra Durable Hinge, 2 Inch, Customizable, Light Blue (W363-44-2925)
